p: The inflammatory environment of this disease points out an increased production of estrogens. This event will raise the production of PGs through the activation of both Nuclear factor ÎºB (NF-kB) and cyclooxygenase-2 (COX-2) [ 31]. In ectopic endometrial areas, the levels of COX-2 are very increased. PGE2 increases the levels of COX-2 in both ectopic and eutopic endometrium. A paper of Banu et al. [ 32] highlighted the influence of COX-2 and PGE2 on the promotion of the migration and invasion of endometrial cells. Furthermore, the inhibition of COX-2 was able to decline the invasion of epithelial and stromal cells in endometriosis.
